channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 7 micro habits one woman in early menopause used to lose 50 pounds
item.description: After noticing she was gaining weight in early menopause, Michelle Kloese took her health into her own hands to keep the weight off.

item.title: Native-born Americans didn’t lose jobs in 2024, as claimed. They gained them.
Biggest news in January job data may have been December revision — follow live
H-1B visa debates roil U.S.-India relations ahead of Trump-Modi meeting. Here’s what needs to change—on both sides
item.description: Can "Made in the USA" and "Make in India" coexist? Protectionist policies from each side are hindering progress.

item.title: U.S. consumer sentiment has dropped sharply this month
Anheuser-Busch’s CEO asks for beer brands to be labelled ‘American’ not ‘domestic’
item.description: Brendan Whitworth, U.S. CEO of Anheuser-Busch, wants to make the marketing change in order to reflect the pride of the brand.

item.title: A small Alaska plane carrying 10 people has gone missing. It’s the third major U.S. aviation incident in the last 8 days
item.description: Nome, a Gold Rush town, is known as the ending point of the 1,000-mile Iditarod Trail Sled Dog Race.

item.title: Latino bishop says some of his pastors are holding church services with the doors locked because ‘they are scared immigration agents will burst through the door at any moment’
item.description: “I feel so bad and so helpless that I can do nothing more for them," said Bishop Ebli De La Rosa.

item.title: China’s economic miracle appears to be over, and the future is looking bleak
U.S. at ‘full employment’ as book closes on Biden-era job market — live updates
